TEXT.TITLE: MASSACHUSETTS GOV. DUKAKIS TO SEEK WHITE HOUSE
TEXT.BODY: Massachusetts Governor Michael Dukakis, a newcomer to national politics, ended weeks of speculation with the announcement he plans to seek the 1988 Democratic presidential nomination. Dukakis said he had authorized the formation of a presidential campaign committee and would make a formal announcement of candidacy in Boston on May 4. The 53-year-old Dukakis is serving his third term as governor. He was reelected with 67 per cent of the vote last November. Reuter
